data.title: WTF? What Kids are Saying in Text Messages
data.meta_description: BRB, LOL, LMAO, SMH, TTYL, WTF. Most of us are aware of SMS language found in text messages, also known as textese, texting language and many other names. The Reality Check Program has compiled a grea
data.text:
Most of us are aware of the use of acronyms in text messages, but the language continues to evolve over time. To help educators and parents stay informed, we have compiled the below list of text speak.

Af - As f***, A**-To-Mouth

AMF - Adios Mother Fu*ker

ATM - At the moment

Bae - before anyone else

BAMF - Bad a** mother F*cker

BBHMM - B**** better have my money

BD - Babydaddy

BM - Babymama

Bsf - Best sister/friend

BTW - By the way

BYOB - Bring your own beer

DILF - Dad I’d like to f*ck

DM - Direct message

Dtm - doing too much (doing the most)

DTF - Down to f*ck

F2F - Face to face

FAH - F***ing a**h***

FB - Facebook

FFS - For f***’s sake

FML - F*** my life

FOH - F*** outta here

FR - For real

FSE- Funniest shit ever

FSU - F*** sh** up

FTW - For the win

FU - F*** you

FYI - For your information

FWM- F*** with me

Fytb - F*** you talking about

Gtfo - Get the f*** out

Gts - Go to sleep

HBIC - Head bitch in charge

Hbu - How bout u

HMB - Hit me back

HMU - Hit me up

HYU - Hit you up

IDGAF- I don’t give a f*ck

IKR - I know right

IMO - In my opinion

IRL- In real life

Jfc - Jesus f***ing christ

JK - Just kidding

Kms - Kill myself

LBS - Laughing but serious

LBVS - Laughing but very serious

LMAO - Laugh my a** off

LMFAO - Laugh my f***ing a** off

LMK - Let me know

LMS - Like my status

LOL - Laugh out loud

LYLAS - Love you like a sister

MCM - Man crush Monday

MF/MOFO - Mother f*cker

MILF - Mother I’d like to f*ck

NM - Nothing much

NBD - No big deal

NP - No problem

NSFW - Not safe for work

NVM - Nevermind

OC - Outta control (on crack)

OG - Original gangster

OMFG - Oh my f***ing god

OMG - Oh my god

Oml - Oh my lord / on my life

OMW - On my way

OOTD - Outfit of the day

PPL - People

Rn - Right now

ROFL - Rolling on the floor laughing

RP - Roleplay

RT - Retweet (real talk)

RS - Real shit

SC - Snapchat

SH - Sh*t happens

Sma - Suck my ass

Smd - Suck my dick

Smh - Shaking my head

SOL - Shit outta luck

Stfu - Shut the f*** up

Stg - Swear to god

TBH - To be honest

TBT - Throw back Thursday

TGIF - Thank god it’s Friday

Thot - That ho(e) over there

Ttm - Talk too much

TF - The f*ck

TTYL - Talk to you later

TXT - Text

WCW - Woman crush Wednesday

Wtf - What the f***

WYM - What you mean

Wyd - What (are) you doing

Wyo - What you on

Wtw - What’s the word (where’s the weed)

Wtm - What’s the move

YOLO - You only live once

V card- virginity
